message: Hello Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180. Is this something you'd be interested in?
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer! The product looks great, but $180 is a bit too steep for me. Would you consider $120?
I understand that $180 is a bit high for you, but I need to make a profit. I can meet you in the middle at $165. Would you be willing to consider that price?
Thanks for countering, Alice. I appreciate you working with me. How about we settle at $135?

I can see you're serious about getting a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to make a decent profit. How about we meet at $155? It's a bit higher than your last offer, but I think it's a fair price for both of us.
Alice, you're really getting close.  I'd be willing to do $140, but that's the absolute best I can do.
I appreciate your honesty, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can meet you at $145. It's a bit lower than my last offer, but I think it's a fair price for the product's value.
Alice, this is getting tough!  I'm trying to make this work, but I can't go any higher than $142.  Take it or leave it.

I understand you're trying to make this work, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $150. That's my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer, so I'll counter at $147. That's the lowest I can go.
